title: Interpretation of seeing the Prophet Joseph in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing our Prophet Joseph in a dream was not on the vision website roy2a.com. Seeing our Master Joseph, peace be upon him, in a dream has many good connotations, and interpreters differed in interpreting the vision of our Master Joseph, peace be upon him, in a dream, according to the state of the dreamer, his circumstances, and whether he is. Was male or female. Single, married or pregnant, and today through the Ruya website we discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing our Prophet Joseph, peace be upon him, in a dream, based on the opinion of major commentators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is Ibn Shirin’s interpretation of the Prophet Joseph in a dream? Seeing the Prophet Joseph in a dream: It indicates the end of all sorrows and worries in the life of the dreamer. Seeing the Prophet Joseph, peace be upon him, in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s patience in his exposure to injustice and distress, but God will reveal the truth soon. Seeing the traveler the Prophet Joseph, peace be upon him, in a dream shows that he will return to his country and settle down. There soon. Seeing the well of the Prophet Joseph, peace be upon him, in a dream indicates that the dreamer will do something bad, but he will overcome it, God willing. See also: Interpretation of seeing the grave of our master Omar bin Al-Khattab in a dream. What is Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of the Prophet Joseph in a dream? Seeing the Prophet Joseph, peace be upon him. In a dream, it indicates the release of distress and the removal of the dreamer’s sadness. Seeing the Prophet Joseph, peace be upon him, in a dream can also indicate the end of any problems or crises between the family or siblings. What is the interpretation of seeing the Prophet Joseph in a dream for a single woman? Seeing an unmarried woman, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him. A blessing in a dream states that she will achieve great success in her academic or professional life. Seeing one person in a dream who resembles the Prophet Joseph, may God bless him and grant him peace, indicates that she will marry a good, pious and benevolent man. Seeing an unmarried woman meeting our Prophet Joseph, peace be upon him, in a dream, which is It indicates positive changes in her life in the coming period that will be the reason for her hope and happiness. Seeing an unmarried woman, our Master Joseph, peace be upon him, giving her something in a dream shows that he will get married soon. See also: Interpretation of seeing Yahya, peace be upon him, in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing the Prophet Joseph getting married in a dream? Seeing him getting married. Prophet Joseph, peace be upon him, knocking on her door in a dream. Indicate happy things for her and her family in the coming period. Seeing the wife of Prophet Joseph, peace be upon him, in a dream declaring that she will hear good news will make her very happy. Seeing Prophet Joseph smiling in a dream indicates intense love between her and her husband and their life full of passion and happiness. Seeing the visit of the Prophet Joseph, peace be upon him, in a dream. This indicates that God will bless her and his blessings are many for her and her family. See also: Interpretation of seeing a Christian in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing the Prophet Joseph in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing the pregnant Prophet Joseph in a dream shows that she will give birth to a child who will enjoy many benefits. Good qualities. Seeing a pregnant woman giving birth to a son will be named Joseph in a dream. This indicates that he will be a good and fair boy to her and their father. What is the interpretation of seeing the Prophet Joseph in a dream for a man? Seeing a man talking to our Master Joseph

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection and the sunrise from the west in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection and the sun rising from the west. The Day of Resurrection is called the Day of Resurrection, and it is the day that we all fear, and we pray to God to cover us on the Day of Resurrection and improve our ending. When we see it in our dreams, we immediately look for an explanation for it, and in the science of dream interpretation, this vision carries many connotations that differ from one case to another depending on the condition of the viewer. We will explain all the cases and their interpretations in the following article: Interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection and the sunrise from the west. The dreamer’s dream about the Day of Resurrection and the sunrise from the west is evidence of his defeat by some people in his life and the loss of many good opportunities that were available to him, and it also shows that there are unusual things happening. Behind him. Therefore, you must pay close attention.Interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection and the sunrise from the west by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer’s vision in his sleep on the Day of Resurrection and the sunrise from the west as an indication that he has made a fateful decision, but it will have a negative impact and after that life will not return to normal again. On the Day of Resurrection and the sun rising from the west in a dream, this is an indication that the dreamer will do many bad deeds and commit sins that will make him not enjoy his life and cause some unrighteous things to happen to him..Interpretation of dreams on the Day of Resurrection and the sun rising from the west for a single woman: seeing an unmarried girl in Her sleeping on the Day of Resurrection and the sun rising from the west is a sign of her lack of prayer and her failure to perform her duties regularly. If a girl dreams of the Day of Resurrection and the sun rising from the west, and she witnesses the horrors of the Day of Resurrection, and feels extreme fear, this symbolizes that she is characterized by constant lying to those around her and must stop. And get used to honesty. Interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection and the sunrise from the west for a married woman. Watching a married woman in her sleep on the Day of Resurrection and the sunrise from the west while she is afraid indicates that she will enter into a difficult experience in her life and she must be patient to overcome it in a good way. Interpretation of dreams about the Day of Resurrection and the sunrise from the west for the pregnant woman. A pregnant woman’s dream of the Day of Resurrection and the sun rising from the west symbolizes that she and her fetus will be exposed to some health problems, crises, and the emergence of some complications that may lead to miscarriage. Interpretation of dreams of the Day of Resurrection and the sun rising from the west for divorced women. For a divorced woman to see the Day of Resurrection in her dream, and the sun rising from the west, this is a sign that she She fears that day and thinks about it a lot, but she must maintain the deeds that please God Almighty until her heart softens. Reassured. A woman who saw the Day of Resurrection and the rising of the sunset in a dream, and felt panic, indicates that she did not perform her duties on time, and the vision is a sign of the continuation of her prayers. If the dreamer dreamed of the Day of Resurrection and the rising of the sun from the west, and she was feeding her son, this symbolizes She will face some difficulties and problems in raising her children. Interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection and the sunrise from the west for a man: Seeing a man sleeping on the Day of Resurrection and the sun setting from the west is evidence that he will do some bad things in his life that will make

title: Interpretation of a dream about a married pregnant mother, Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about an unmarried pregnant mother who is married to Ibn Sirin. God Almighty said in His Noble Book: {It is He who created you in the wombs as He willed. During a marital relationship, the egg is fertilized in the pregnant woman’s uterus with the man’s sperm, and the subject of pregnancy is the feeling that every married woman desires, because this feeling is linked to the maternal instinct of every woman. On earth and everyone will be happy once they hear it. The news of someone’s pregnancy, and for this reason many wanted to interpret the dream of a pregnant mother, a single woman, or a married woman, according to Ibn Sirin. Below is all the information that revolves around the subject of dream interpretation. I see my mother pregnant for a single woman. The normal pregnancy period for a pregnant woman lasts for nine months, and the pregnant woman during this period counts the days one after the other. Until she sees her fetus in her arms and even those around her count the days of joy with her. The fetus, and here is all the information about the interpretation of seeing a mother for an unmarried pregnant woman: An unmarried woman in a dream considers her mother pregnant, among the pleasant dreams that indicate that the girl will move on to a feeling of great happiness throughout her life. If she suffers from some problems that she considers to be an obstacle In her life and she dreams that her mother is pregnant, this dream is an indication that all sorrows, problems and worries will disappear from the path of her life. Strong will. The woman who is about to undergo examinations and sees in a dream that her mother is pregnant, this indicates the ease of examinations that she will conduct. She is the one who was looking for a source of income and saw in a dream that her mother is pregnant and her mother is swollen due to the pregnancy. This dream indicates that she will obtain a source of income. A large income will change her life for the better, whether with money or even in the social relationships that she will earn through her work. An unmarried girl who dreams that her mother is pregnant and giving birth to a male child, this dream indicates that someone will marry her soon and take her to the world of happiness, God willing. And the pregnant mother who Giving birth to a baby girl in a dream is a sign of the abundance of goodness and abundance of livelihood that the dreamer will receive, God willing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about vomiting for a married woman in a dream for all interpreters. Interpretation of seeing my mother pregnant for a married woman. The period of pregnancy is considered one of the happiest periods filled with feelings of anxiety, due to the pregnant woman’s intense fear On the health of the fetus, as well as her great concern for herself, and below is all the information that revolves around the interpretation of a dream about a pregnant mother for a married woman: A married woman’s dream of her mother’s pregnancy is evidence of the abundance of sustenance and the abundance of goodness that will soon befall her and her husband, God Almighty. And whoever sees that it is her and her mother Two pregnant women in a dream, then this dream indicates that her husband will enter a new type of trade that will significantly change her life for the better. A married woman who sees that her mother is pregnant and has given birth to a son is considered to be that she and her husband will occupy a high and great position in society. As for a child born to a married woman, it is a sign of nourishment. An abundance and abundance of goodness that will affect her entire life. And for everyone

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing failure in an exam in a dream and what it indicates

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about failing exams in a dream for a single woman: Failing exams is a disturbing vision that indicates material losses or the fear of going through some experiences in life. Failing exams in a dream is one of the things that causes extreme fear among all students, regardless of their levels in school. Many students may start to see failing an exam during a dream and this dream becomes the cause of many psychological problems and stress and each of them wants to know the correct interpretation and signs that this dream indicates. Through the article I will explain to you different interpretations related to this dream. There are some visions for this dream, which are a good interpretation of the dream of seeing failure in an exam in a single woman’s dream. The dream of failure in a dream is one of the visions that describes and expresses the inner feeling of the person who sees it, and this occurs as a result of the accumulation of pressures and obligations that the dreamer carries in order to reach the desired dream. Study stage. Many students may see a dream about failing an exam while sleeping, and this dream causes many problems for students and causes fear and anxiety. Each of them asks and wants to know the correct interpretation of the dream and the associations that this dream shows. This dream appears today. Through my view, you will get to know On the different interpretations of this dream. Interpretation of a dream about failing exams: Seeing failure in exams is evidence of fear of some responsibilities in the fortuneteller’s life. Failing an exam may indicate some losses that the fortuneteller faces in his life. Failing an exam may indicate the loss of the plans drawn up by the fortuneteller Seeing the dreamer in a dream is that he is taking exams, a sign of his marriage in the near future. Whoever dreams that he is on the exam board and cannot answer, this symbolizes a lack of self-confidence. Seeing failure in an exam is evidence of the failure he faces in his life. The dream could indicate Failing an exam leads to stress and anxiety. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an exam in a dream. A dream about failing an exam for unmarried women: Failing an exam for unmarried women can indicate a failure in a romantic relationship. Failing an exam is evidence of problems between the girl and her partner. See also Interpretation of a dream about seeing success in a dream: A dream about failing an exam for a pregnant woman: Failure in an exam may indicate difficulty in giving birth to a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman’s failure to take an exam in a dream indicates that the pregnancy is complete and the fetus is in good health. Failure to take an exam may indicate difficulties during childbirth. Interpretation of a man’s dream With failure: If a man sees in a dream that he cannot answer an exam and fails it, this indicates the presence of problems and the emergence of some distasteful things in his life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a failed exam in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about failing an exam in Nabulsi: Failing an exam when seeing it in The dream is evidence of a difficult period full of problems. A dream about failing an exam indicates the dreamer’s fear of this period. A dream about failing an exam is an indication of the fear of failure and failure to achieve achievement.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a heater in a dream for a single woman and a married woman

preview.html: Welcome to the encyclopedia of dream interpretation. This article discusses seeing a fireplace of all kinds and types in a dream. We show you the most important symbols and meanings that the “greenhouse” refers to in the dream of a man and a woman: married, pregnant, or single. We wish you an enjoyable and useful viewing. Interpretation of a dream about a heater in general: In the beginning, the heater was a group of wood, tree branches, or straw, in which a fire was lit. In the past, it was used in caves or forests. Today, “heating” has developed slowly, for example, we found a hole in a stone wall, in which coal and firewood are placed and then ignited to heat the house. There are also electric heaters and heaters that work with gasoline, liquid gas, or any type of fuel. If the heater differs in reality between electric and ordinary, then its meaning in the dream is the same and it mainly expresses emotional life or emotions and appears in the dreams of people who suffer from feelings of relatively cold or emotional deprivation, and this is what we will discover successively the following elements. Interpretation of the stove In a single woman’s dream, if an unmarried girl sees that she is sitting next to a heater, this means that a good company or watchful company may have already lived or is preparing for the future. Buying a heater in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates a new stage in her life filled with warmth, tenderness, care, and stability in general. A fireplace in a married woman’s dream. Any dream related to fire in a dream is considered praiseworthy, because it expresses domestication, psychological warmth, and “heating” that works well and does not emit smoke that harms his fireplace, because it can express abandonment or cold feelings towards important people in life. , such as a husband or family in general. A new fireplace in a married woman’s dream may represent a new friend or a strong bond that connects her to someone who may be her brother or father. A fireplace in a pregnant woman’s dreamThe repercussions of a fireplace in a pregnant woman’s dream are the same as those of a married woman. But a fireplace that works with wood, electricity, or gasoline can express the safety of the pregnant woman if the heater works well and does not emit smoke and the fire burning inside is quiet because this is a symbol of safety and comfort in general. The fireplace in a man’s dream in general is “warmth” in a single man’s dream. The married woman symbolizes women in general. She can be the lover in the first place, and she can be the wife or any other woman who brings warmth or tenderness to the man himself. Perhaps purchasing a “greenhouse” in this context heralds the dreamer’s marriage, as turning off the heater may symbolize the end of a romantic relationship. It is not good in dreams to light the heater or burn the house, because this dream could represent a fight or fight. Conclusion “Heat” In general, it is a source of warmth, and the word “warmth” here may refer to passion, but it sometimes expresses wealth or financial stability, and a man who is warm in his feelings is necessarily generous in his morals. Goodness is materially related to nutrition or morally related to feelings and love, so we consider e

Conclusion “Heat” In general, it is a source of warmth, and the word “warmth” here may refer to passion, but it sometimes expresses wealth or financial stability, and a man who is warm in his feelings is necessarily generous in his morals. Goodness is materially related to nutrition or morally related to feelings and love, so we consider e

title: Interpretation of a dream about someone ignoring you in a dream

preview.html: Ignorance is actually one of the most annoying and sad things that a person is exposed to, especially if it comes from someone dear to the monarch or loved by him, and the interpretation of a dream about someone ignoring you in a dream has many repercussions. Here in this article we will provide you in detail with the interpretation of a dream about someone ignoring you in a dream, so follow our following lines. Interpretation of a dream about someone ignoring youFor a man, the interpretation of a dream about someone ignoring you in a dream could be a sign of some discomfort or problems for the dreamer. This may indicate That this person does not have feelings such as love and emotions as he imagines. It could be a sign of that person’s lack of sincerity and loyalty to the monarch. It may symbolize his confusion and tension at this time due to his preoccupation with some important matters or decisions. But if the sleeper sees his friend ignoring him in the dream, This means that this person will cause trouble and distress to the dreamer. Seeing an ignorant lover in a dream symbolizes the failure of a relationship or perhaps love is only one-sided. Interpretation of a dream about someone ignoring you for a womanInterpretation of a dream about someone ignoring you in a dream about a single woman, which symbolizes To the need for care and attention from this person because he does not deserve the trust you give him. The interpretation of this dream for a woman in general is a warning against lying and deception, so she should not easily trust those around her. Ignoring a lover in a dream for an unmarried woman is only a reflection of her condition. From the fear of losing her lover. But if she sees that her friend is ignoring her in her dream, this symbolizes the evil of that friend, so she must stay away from her, be careful, and be careful. The interpretation of a husband’s dream of ignoring his wife could symbolize the difficulties and worries that occupy the husband’s mind and he must help him And supports him to overcome it. See also: Seeing someone I love in a dream Seeing a lover in our house in a dream In the end, we explained to you the interpretation of a dream about someone ignoring you in a dream about men and women in detail, hoping that you will like it, and we are happy to receive your dreams for interpretation as soon as possible. as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about makeup by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about makeup in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. This dream is considered by many women in a dream, and since one of their most important hobbies is makeup to emphasize and highlight their beauty or even help them increase their beauty, just as makeup helps to hide anything. There are flaws in every woman's face, but every girl must choose the makeup that suits her face, and we find that there are many people who may dream of wearing makeup in a dream and do not know whether this vision is good. Or bad, and through our article we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about makeup. On a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi and everything related to it in terms of interpretations and connotations. Interpretation of a dream about makeup in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing makeup in a dream means an abundance of money and a happy life, and if a merchant sees a lot of makeup in a dream, he will have a lot of money and successful trade. Ibn Sirin says that If a person sees in a dream that he is wearing makeup, this means that this person is dissatisfied with himself and is always trying to change a problem and beautify his image in front of others. If a person appears to be wearing a lot of makeup, this indicates that this person is trying to hide his true face from people in order to deceive them. If the dreamer sees that he is putting on makeup and then wiping it off again, this means that he will get rid of the problems that are bothering him in his life and bothering him. In the case of a pregnant woman, this indicates that she will give birth to a girl, but if she wears a lot of makeup, this indicates that she will give birth to a boy. If the dream is for a girl Unmarried, this indicates that she will marry a good man. The interpretation of a dream about makeup in an unmarried woman’s dream confirms that she will soon enjoy the touching words of some people. Perhaps he will do good things at work or in the family and others will admire what he did. See also: Interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin Seeing Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman in a dream Interpretation of a dream about eye makeup in a dream A dream about makeup is one of the dreams that carries many connotations for the dreamer, whether she is single, married, pregnant, or She is divorced, and makeup is an adornment for a woman to highlight her beauty and femininity. Follow the dream: A dream about eye makeup, and drawing a beautiful eye, indicates that the right decisions are being made. A dream about beautiful eye makeup for a single woman in a dream shows her husband being a young man whom she wants and loves, and she will live a happy life, God willing. Seeing a married woman drawing attention in an unwanted or beautiful way indicates that she is not Satisfied with her choice of life partner, she is also dissatisfied with making her own decisions about her future. See also: Interpretation of a dream about snow in a dream for a married and single womanInterpretation of a dream about makeup for a married womanApplying makeup in a dream for a married woman indicates the instability of her emotional or marital life. If a married woman sees If she wears makeup irregularly or poorly, this indicates her poor treatment of her husband, family, and relatives. Wearing makeup in a dream for a married woman also indicates that she is hiding her true age in real life. Wearing makeup in a dream indicates that

title: Interpretation of a dream about theft by Ibn Sirin, theft in a dream, and interpretation of a dream about theft and escape

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about stealing: Some people have many questions about dreaming about stealing in a dream and want to be reassured if it brings a good sign or portends the emergence of evil, but the interpretation of any dream always depends on factors related to the person’s circumstances and what he is like. He stole in a dream, and in this article you will find all the interpretations related to the interpretation of the dream... stealing, according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and other major scholars. Interpretation of a dream about stealing: Interpretation of a dream about stealing in a dream indicates an unfit environment, malicious intentions, and the evil nature that the dreamer clings to. The dreamer being robbed portends the appearance of evil for him from a close person, and his act of stealing indicates the corruption of the company to which he belongs, but if in reality he is complaining of a lot of worries and problems, then the interpretation of the dream of theft portends the approaching deception and the end of everything that exhausts his thinking. When he sees Someone has his car stolen in a dream, this symbolizes that the thief will be the owner of the employer in which you work, and stealing money from the house means that the thief will marry him, but if an animal steals it, this means that it will help him travel abroad. In general, the interpretation of a dream about theft for someone who stumbles in his decisions indicates The need to be careful and not waste time in the wrong direction. Interpretation of a dream about stealing by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about stealing confirms that cheating in a dream means that the dreamer is surrounded by people who do not deserve his trust and are trying to take advantage of him badly. A house in a dream means the death of a family member in the near future. If a thief takes your clothes, the interpretation of a dream about theft means that it will be an occasion to consummate your marriage. As for stealing money and papers from the bag, it symbolizes loss of work or interruption. A source of livelihood that the viewer depends on. Also, the theft of a passport indicates the lack of success in professional life and the interpretation of a dream about theft, and the bed in a dream shows that someone is abusing you and revealing your secrets, and when a married man sees food stolen from his house, it indicates the husband’s illness. Interpretation of a dream about theft by Imam Al-SadiqThe meaning is precisely determined for the interpretation of theft In a dream according to what was stolen, and Imam Al-Sadiq believes that a fortuneteller who steals in a dream often means that he has nothing in reality and a feeling of weakness and weakness. Confidence that he is qualified to be satisfied with what he has, and stealing money in a dream shows the fears that fill him about the future and a lot of thinking about the future, and the more the amount of money increases, the more worries and difficulties appear. Times.In Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation of the dream of theft, stealing a car symbolizes alienation and being away from family and loved ones for a long time, and stealing an animal symbolizes the obstacles and problems they face while walking the path of life, especially goals. And ambitions that he sets for himself, but when the husband is seen stealing a child, this means facing difficulty in conceiving and aspiring to this desire. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google, the dream interpretation website on the Internet, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a dream of stealingThe interpretation of a dream of stealing L

title: Interpretation of a dream about dawn prayer for a single, married, pregnant, or divorced person by Ibn Sirin in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the dawn prayer for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, or a man according to Ibn Sirin in detail is that the dawn prayer is one of the five prayers that God Almighty commanded his Muslim servants to perform on a daily basis. Sunrise and Fajr prayers are some of the most popular prayers that true believers love to pray as it wakes them up from their beloved sleep time. While the dawn prayer is equivalent to standing up for an entire night, and many people want to obtain all the information on the subject of interpreting the dream of the dawn prayer for singles, married people, pregnant women, divorced men, and men according to Ibn Sirin in detail. The interpretation follows. A single woman’s dream of dawn prayer: Fajr prayer is one of the most important prayers that all Muslims must perform at the beginning of their day because one of the virtues of dawn prayer is that it protects a person from all diseases and disasters. An unmarried girl who sees in her dream that she is praying from her sleep, the interpretation of this The dream is one of the pleasant dreams that one has, because it indicates a large group of people who will change her life for the better. For an unmarried girl who has a large group of problems and worries in her life, and she saw in her dream that she was performing the dawn prayer, the interpretation of this dream is that it is an indication of the approaching time for all problems and fears to disappear from her life. This dream, according to the opinion of all dream interpretation scholars, is an indication of The dreamer's arrival date is approaching in all his aspirations and dreams. The unmarried fiancée who sees in her dream that she wakes up and prays Fajr, and her fiancé is with her in the dream, praying with her. The interpretation of this dream is that it is an indication that the girl's date is approaching. Marriage. As for the girl who is in an emotional state and sees in a dream that she is performing the dawn prayer, the interpretation of this dream indicates the sincerity of the person she loves and will propose marriage to her as soon as possible. If she has an expatriate and she sees in her dream that she is praying the dawn prayer with this expatriate. Its interpretation indicates the approaching time of his return to his home. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a child drowning and saving him in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its interpretation for a single and married woman. Interpretation of a dream about dawn prayer for a married woman. A married woman must be a good role model for her children, and there is no better role model than a married woman who prays every day. prayers; Because it depends on instilling a love of prayer in the souls of children. The interpretation of a dream about dawn prayer for a married woman comes as a sign of the disappearance of all problems and worries in her life. A married woman suffers from many marital problems and saw in her dream that she was praying dawn prayer next to her husband, so the interpretation of this dream indicates the closest A time for problems to disappear and a state of stability to return to their concerns. A married woman who does not have children sees in her dream that she is getting up to perform the dawn prayer. This dream represents the approaching time of hearing the news of her pregnancy, may God Almighty bless her. See also: Interpretation of the Duha prayer in a dream and its most important meanings for Nablus. Interpretation of a dream Fajr prayer for pregnant women: One should memorize all the prayers daily, and perform each prayer at its proper time, and the first prayer that begins at the beginning of each day is the dawn prayer, because this prayer is the one that
